title: shendil ANDavan
sahitya:
shenNdil ANDavan shiva kumaran sEvaDi paNivOmE tiru


anupallavi

  undik-kamalap-perumAn tirumAl marugan Arumukhan


caraNam    vElan vaLLi devAnai lOlan tAL tozhum anbar bAlaka murugan kOla mayil vAhana karuNAlavAla shIlan guha perumAn rAmadAsan agham vaLar SaNmukhap-perumAn
